Vrml2Sourcebook.Chapter10Materials

Class Figure10_04BrightRedSphere

  • java.lang.Object
    • Vrml2Sourcebook.Chapter10Materials.Figure10_04BrightRedSphere

  • public class Figure10_04BrightRedSphere
extends java.lang.Object

    Bright red sphere, showing use of Appearance and Material.

    Related links: Figure10_04BrightRedSphere.java source, Figure10_04BrightRedSphere catalog page, X3D Resources, X3D Scene Authoring Hints, and X3D Tooltips.

    This program uses the X3D Java Scene Access Interface Library (X3DJSAIL). It has been produced using the X3dToJava.xslt stylesheet to create Java source code from an .x3d model.
